<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Animated Fireplace](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2059)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Construct" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=35" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 14</row>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** -2

**Con** +5

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 (20 when broken)

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +8 

construct armor
</row>

**HP** 65

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Construct Armor** Like normal objects, the animated fireplace has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage the fireplace takes by 7. Once the animated fireplace is reduced to fewer than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks, removing the Hardness and reducing its Armor Class to 20.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hearth +15 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 bludgeoning plus 1d6 fire and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Bellow Soot** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The animated fireplace coughs out a cloud of soot, filling a 20-foot emanation; creatures within the soot are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4), and creatures outside the cloud are concealed to creatures within it. Creatures that begin their turn within the cloud must succeed at a DC 19 Fortitude save or be [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (sickened 2 on a critical failure); creatures immune to [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=96) effects automatically succeed at this save. The fireplace can't Bellow Soot again for 1d4 rounds.

**Fan the Flames** <actions string="Three Actions" />  The animated fireplace releases a gout of flame in a 30-foot cone that deals 3d6 fire damage (DC 22 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Medium, 2d6+5 fire, Rupture 5

</column>
name: Animated Fireplace
